snippet: The N.B.A. is unveiling a redesigned, fully sortable engine — free to the public — that contains every box score, allows fans to analyze lineups and includes advanced metrics.
abstract: NBA is unveiling redesigned, fully sortable search engine on its Web site that contains just about every statistic in league history.
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. is unveiling a redesigned, fully sortable engine — free to the public — that contains every box score, allows fans to analyze lineups and includes advanced metrics.

headline.seo: N.B.A.’s Site to Feature Updated Stat Database
headline.main: Advanced Statistics Added to Revamped N.B.A. Site
